data.title: Rasheed Wallace Player Profile, New York Knicks
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Rasheed Wallace on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 28, 1995 - The Washington Bullets selected Rasheed Wallace in Round 1 with Pick 4 in the 1995 NBA Draft. Sep 27, 1995 - Rasheed Wallace signed a multi-year contract with the Washington Bullets. Jul 15, 1996 - Rasheed Wallace was acquired by the Portland Trail Blazers from the Washington Bullets in a trade. Sep 29, 1997 - Rasheed Wallace signed a rookie scale extension with the Portland Trail Blazers. Feb 9, 2004 - Rasheed Wallace was acquired by the Atlanta Hawks, along with Wesley Person and a TPE, from the Portland Trail Blazers in exchange for Shareef Abdur-Rahim, Dan Dickau and Theo Ratliff. Feb 19, 2004 - Rasheed Wallace was acquired by the Detroit Pistons, along with Mike James, from the Atlanta Hawks in exchange for Chucky Atkins, Lindsey Hunter, Zeljko Rebraca, Bob Sura, a 2004 1st round pick (DET own), a conditional 2003 1st round pick (MIL own) and cash. Jul 1, 2004 - Rasheed Wallace, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Jul 23, 2004 - Rasheed Wallace signed a multi-year contract with the Detroit Pistons. Jul 1, 2009 - Rasheed Wallace, previously with the Detroit Pistons, became a free agent. Jul 8, 2009 - The Detroit Pistons renounced their free-agent exception rights to Rasheed Wallace. Jul 8, 2009 - Rasheed Wallace signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics. Aug 10, 2010 - Rasheed Wallace retired from professional basketball. Aug 10, 2010 - The Boston Celtics placed the contract of Rasheed Wallace on waivers. Aug 17, 2010 - Rasheed Wallace, previously with the Boston Celtics, became a free agent. Oct 1, 2012 - Rasheed Wallace decided to come out of retirement and resume his professional basketball career. Oct 2, 2012 - Rasheed Wallace signed a contract with the New York Knicks. Apr 16, 2013 - Rasheed Wallace, previously with the New York Knicks, became a free agent. Apr 16, 2013 - The New York Knicks placed the contract of Rasheed Wallace on waivers.
